reviewText: Works! 4 for onersz
I purchased this Laugh Out Loud 4- movie collection and it came with ONE dvd. ONE! If I had wanted only Superbad, I would only purchased that single movie. VERY disappointing.
like all the films on this dvd so I bought it and very cheap may I add

I did not like this rating I like P.G. rating.
would not recommend this movie.
I do like the ones with Adam Sandler.
The only problem that I had with the movie set was that the movies in the set were not the unrated versions.
Four movies for this price, you can't beat it. Satisfied with my purchase and if you enjoy this silly type of humor, you will be to.
The Pineapple Express and Superbad DVDs are separate and the other two are combined on one disc. Great deal!
bought for a friend she will like.

Pineapple Express is, in my opinion, one of the best plotted, funniest comedy stories ever put to screen. Every single part of that movie is absolute perfection.

Superbad is amazing as well. One of the comedies I can watch again and again and never get bored.

Year One is probably my number 1 guilty pleasure movie. I know it's not a good film by any means, but I enjoy it immensely.

I haven't yet watched Youth in Revolt, so I can't comment.
like all the films in one
All the disks came as promised along with an extra disk I don't think was supposed to be included with The Animal,Bench Warmers and Billy Madison on it
so so laffs
The discs sit on top of each other in the case. Cheap.
Great item with a clear description & an unbelievable price.
Good buy
Great combo of movies!!

Great Delivery Time!!!
Great Item!!!
good dvds i love them all very good buy..

There are four movies in this collection three of them are modern comedy classics. Superbad and Pineapple Express are 5/5 films, Youth in Revolt is a 4/5 film its only downside is Michael Cera is too much like his Superbad  character without Jonah Hill. Year One is funny but a bit weaker than the others an average 3/5. The movies lack special features and even a scene selection menu but a lot of these bundle packs do. For what you are buying it's a five star collection. The lack of special features doesn't bother me this isn't the Criterion Collection here.
Great!
Perfect collection of movies for the fellow stoner  Just get it
Great set of movies!
Came as an empty case with no dvds...
Case says it has subtitles and top menu says it has subtitles, but cannot get them to work.  I can select them and turn English on/off, but no subtitles are shown.  I tried two different DVD players.
